    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Add_Question_GUI
    Add window for admin to add question to database for Quiz.
    Admin_QMS_GUI
    Main dashboard for admin in the Quiz application.
    DBConnection
    Handles database connection.
    DBDelete
    Provides database operations for deleting questions from the quiz system.
    DBFetch
    Handles database operations for retrieving questions from the quiz system.
    DBInsertion
    Handles database operations for inserting new questions into the quiz system database.
    DBLogin
    Handles user authentication and role management for the quiz system.
    DBQuiz
    Handles quiz-specific database operations including game play, scoring, leaderboards, and player statistics.
    DBUpdate
    Handles database operations for updating existing questions in the Quiz database.
    Delete_Question_GUI
    Delete window for admin to remove questions from the Quiz database.
    Leaderboard_GUI
    Leaderboard window displaying player rankings and statistics for Quiz.
    Login_GUI
    Login window for the Quiz application.
    Play_Quiz_GUI
    Main game interface for playing quiz in Quiz.
    Players_GUI
    Player Management window for administrators in Quiz.
    Question
    Represents a quiz question with all its properties.
    Quiz_Score_GUI
    Score View window for players to review their quiz performance history.
    QuizGame
    Manages the core game logic for Quiz Mania.
    Register_GUI
    Registration window for new users to create accounts in Quiz.
    Statistics_GUI
    Statistics window for admin to view comprehensive player performance data.
    StyleConfig
    Centeralized style configuration for the Quiz Management System.
    Update_Question_GUI
    Update window for administrators to modify existing questions in Quiz.
    User_Dashboard_GUI
    User Dashboard - Main Menu After Login This window is displayed after a user successfull log in to Quiz.
    View_Question_GUI
    View Questions Window - Search and Display Quiz Questions This window allows administrators to search for questions by ID and view their details.
